headline: Medtronic earns U.S. FDA approval for the world's first Adaptive deep brain stimulation system for people with Parkinson's
summary: New closed-loop system self-adjusts DBS therapy to individual brain activity in real time; the largest commercial launch of brain-computer interface technology ever GALWAY, Ireland, Feb. 24, 2025...
